name: pnp-copy-files-to-another-library
title: Copy files to another SharePoint Library in another site
shortDescription: This script shows how you can use the CLI to copy all files and folders from source library to a different library.
longDescription: This script shows how you can use the CLI to copy all files and folders from source library to a different library.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
